payroll.description: Contains payroll data for New York City employees. Each row represents an employee's payroll details for a specific fiscal year. NOTE: Salary and monetary columns contain '$' symbols and are stored as TEXT. You must strip the '$' and cast to numeric for calculations (e.g. CAST(REPLACE(base_salary, '$', '') AS REAL)).

columns.fiscal_year: The fiscal year of the payroll record.
columns.agency_name: The city agency that employs the person.
columns.work_location_borough: The borough where the employee works (e.g., MANHATTAN, QUEENS).
columns.leave_status_as_of_june_30: Status of the employee at the end of the fiscal year (Active/Ceased/On Leave).
columns.pay_basis: How the employee is paid (e.g., per Annum, per Day, per Hour).
columns.regular_gross_paid: Total amount paid for regular hours (Text with $).
